reviews.text: I don't have JF's Milk Chocolate but I put in 1% MB Glamour Chocolate and used only .5 sweetener and it's excellent.
Can't say I've made any recipe more than once either, just made a second batch! It's hard to put down! (I still had some old INW MC left hehe)

I usually only ever mix any recipe a few times at most, even ones I really like.  I just can't stay interested in anything for very long.  This recipe is so good I've mixed it at least 6 times in two months now.  Not a fan of chocolate vapes but like the description says - even if you're not a chocolate fan give it chance.
Very smooth. Made a batch for my Sister and she loves it too. I am a sucker for anything Chocolate. This is my first Chocolate vape and I keep this is my rotation.
It hits the profile nicely. Not my adv but doesn't mean it won't be yours!
Awesome! The same as drinking a real amazing chocolate shake!

Great recipe! Not too sweet with well-balanced chocolate taste. 
Great work man...;)
Delicious chocolate vape! Personally I prefer this over Cuprian as I'm not a big fan of mint.
